message.entry: N and K must be positive scalar integers.
N must be larger than K.
N must equal 2^m-1 for some integer m between 3 and 16.
To use the default PRIM_POLY, it must be marked by [].
PRIM_POLY must be a scalar integer.
B must be an integer scalar.
The outputFormat parameter value must be either ''double'' or ''gf''.
Code generation cannot handle Galois field output. Please set the parameter ''outputFormat'' of rsgenpoly function to ''double''.
